SEARCH
Package Transactions

Class DiscountReceipt

java.lang.Object
Transactions.Receipt
Transactions.DiscountReceipt
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonIdentifiable
public class DiscountReceipt extends Receipt
The DiscountReceipt class extends the Receipt class to represent a receipt with a discount applied. It includes details about the discount and the remaining point balance after the discount has been applied.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DiscountReceipt(String name, Payment payment, double cashRegister, TransactionList transactions, Discount discount, double newPointBalance)
    Constructs a new DiscountReceipt with the specified name, payment, cash register, transactions, discount, and new point balance.

  • Constructor Details

    • DiscountReceipt

      public DiscountReceipt(String name, Payment payment, double cashRegister, TransactionList transactions, Discount discount, double newPointBalance)
      Constructs a new DiscountReceipt with the specified name, payment, cash register, transactions, discount, and new point balance.
      Parameters:
      name - the name on the receipt
      payment - the payment for the receipt
      cashRegister - the cash register where the receipt was processed
      transactions - the transactions on the receipt
      discount - the discount applied to the receipt
      newPointBalance - the new point balance after the discount has been applied
